titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the George F. Crabbe papers, 1876, 1881, and undated.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: George F. Crabbe papers, 1876, 1881, and undated.

archdesc.bioghist: Detroit, Mich., gardener. By 1886 he had moved to Grand Rapids, Mich., and owned a greenhouse.
archdesc.scopecontent: Diaries describing in detail his daily work, also an exercise book relating to elocution and other topics.
